org.middleheaven.persistance
Interface DataQuery

All Known Subinterfaces:
ParameterizedDataQuery
public interface DataQuery

Method Summary
 DataRowStream getRowStream()
          Returns the query DataRowStream.

Method Detail

getRowStream

DataRowStream getRowStream()
Returns the query DataRowStream. Subsequent calls to this method will return different , reset, DataRowStream

Returns:
the query DataRowStream.

rowCount

long rowCount()
Returns:
the quantity of rows that will be found if this query is applied;

isEmpty

boolean isEmpty()
Returns:
true if rowCount would return 0,false otherwise.

limit

DataQuery limit(int startAt,
                int maxCount)
Creates a new query base on the same criteria used for this but with limited elements

Parameters:
startAt - ordinal position of the first row in the new query (1 is the first)
maxCount - the maximum quantity of rows to read.
Returns:
a new, limited, DataQuery.
